mapper.sql: Name, Port, ipAddress, Time, Type, Initial, Committed, Maximum, Used
mapper.insert:
insert into memory_pool
Name,
Port,
ipAddress,
Time,
Type,
Initial,
Committed,
Maximum,
Used,
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{port,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{initial,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{committed,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{maximum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{used,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mapper.select: select * from memory_pool where ipAddress=#{ipaddress} and port=#{port} order by time DESC,name DESC limit 6
